name: imagineBroadband
description: A refreshed new look, imagineBroadband (previously MyTelBru) offers you the convenience and time-efficient means of carrying out your imagine services on the go with your Android device. Whether its internet or voice services, imagineBroadband is the seamless mobile app for payments, usage tracking, updates and so much more.  Once downloaded, the apps simple interface and easy navigation will grant you access to a number of functions such as:   Pay your bills   View your profile   Monitor your usage   Get notified on whats new   View account history and activity, and more.  To enjoy these services and more, download the app to undergo a simple registration process and youre ready to experience what imagineBroadband has to offer.
